name: Fettuccine with Cherry Tomato Butter Sauce
author: James C Delmage
description: There is nothing simpler than fettuccine with cherry tomato butter sauce. Bright cherry tomatoes are sauteed in butter with chopped onion, tossed with al dente fettuccine, and finished with fresh parsley and basil. Perfect for weeknights or when you’re short on time but don’t want to compromise on flavor.
